attributes.review: I was looking toward for a better way to commune with our dear president but i just keep getting messages with weird porn attached and trump writing very detailed messages about how Jeffery epstein is totally “dead”
attributes.title: I expected.

attributes.review: This app took HOURS to download. When i finally got to opening it... IT CRASHED! SEVERAL! TIMES! I restarted my phone multiple times to where it finally worked.. and one it did... I was horrified!
attributes.title: Terrible app.

attributes.review: i got this app to get some new orange man merch but what happened was so much worst. as i started looking all the sudden i had a sudden urge to say racist and sexiest things to people. i was very scary after a while i started getting old trump tweets on my phone and they were scary and explicit. then blood started coming out of my eyes. i was very scared and rushed to the er. i am hoping donald will play for the emergency medical bills and my therapy.
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I got this app thinking it was gonna be good because trump has enough money to make it good but overall such a terrible app, highly do not recommend. I would give it 0 stars if I could. PLEASE DO NOT GET
attributes.title: Very bad

attributes.review: I got this app to be able to see Donald trumps plans but every time I try to open the app it tells me I have a virus and it kicks me out of the app and my whole phone malfunctioned
attributes.title: Wow I cannot

attributes.review: When I got it, it kept crashing my phone after a week of use. No matter if it was different apps or no.
attributes.title: It is horrible

attributes.review: This app is so bad i can’t comprehend if an adult did it nor not graphics were horrible the “president” somehow looks orange in all his pictures which has no explanation rather than he loves his carrots and ate so much he turned orange
attributes.title: COMPLETELY HORRIBLE!!!

attributes.review: i was walking downtown at night, and theres a shortcut to get to my house through this short ally way. so i decide to go down it, i start to hear footsteps behind me and little do i know, its the donald trump offical app 2020... he put me in a choke hold and body slammed me, giving me a concussion. he took my phone and threatened to leak my personal info and kill my family. wouldn't recommend getting this app 💔
attributes.title: almost killed me!

attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app it promptly kicked me DIRECTLY in the face. I don’t know if this is supposed to be some kind of joke or something, but please do not download this app for the safety of you and your family.
attributes.title: BAD APP

attributes.review: The app just doesn’t work. I upended it up and it wanted personal information like my phone number, age and city. Why is that important? Y’all though tik tok was dangerous! Watch out for this app!
attributes.title: Worse app ever
